ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Who I Am
ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based in St. Gallen. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.

LOCATION.TITLE: Flexible in terms of working environments
LOCATION.TEXT: I can work effectively both on-site in St. Gallen and remotely.

MINDSET.TITLE: Open-minded
MINDSET.TEXT: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.

APPROACH.TITLE: My Approach
APPROACH.TEXT: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS.SUBTITLE: Technologies
SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.

NEW_SKILL.TITLE: You need another skill?
NEW_SKILL.CONTACT_INFO: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROBLEM.TITLE: Got a problem to solve?
PROBLEM.DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

MESSAGE.LABEL: How can I help you?
MESSAGE.PLACEHOLDER: Hello Martin, I am interested in...

FORM.PRIVACY_END: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

PORTFOLIO.SUBTITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Featured Projects
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

LINKS.CONTENT: References and links to third party websites are outside our area of responsibility. Any responsibility for such websites is declined. The access and use of such websites is at the user's own risk.

COPYRIGHT.CONTENT: The copyright and all other rights to content, images, photos or other files on this website belong exclusively to Martin Jaros or the specifically named rights holders. Written consent must be obtained in advance from the copyright holder for the reproduction of any elements.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO: We value transparency in handling personal data. This privacy policy provides information about what personal data we collect, for what purpose, and to whom we disclose it.

CONTACT.TITLE: 2. Contact Information
CONTACT.CONTENT:
For questions or concerns about the protection of your data, you can reach us at any time via email. Responsible for data processing through this website is:

Martin Jaros
Witenwisstrasse 23a
9200 Gossau SG
Switzerland

Data Protection Officer:
Martin Jaros

Email: martinjaros88@gmail.com

DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: 3.1 What Data We Collect
DATA_COLLECTION.CONTENT:
We primarily process personal data that you submit to us or that we collect during the operation of our website. In some circumstances, we may also receive personal data about you from third parties. This may include the following categories:

• Personal master data (name, address, date of birth, etc.)
• Contact details (mobile number, email address, etc.)
• Online identifiers (e.g., cookie ID, IP addresses)
• Location and traffic data

PROCESSING.TITLE: 3.2 Under What Conditions Do We Process Your Data?
PROCESSING.CONTENT:
We treat your data confidentially and in accordance with the purposes set out in this privacy policy. We ensure transparent and proportionate processing.

If we are exceptionally unable to follow these principles, data processing may still be lawful because there is a justification. Justification may include:

• Your consent
• The execution of a contract or pre-contractual measures
• Our legitimate interests, provided your interests do not prevail

CONSENT.TITLE: 3.3 How Can You Withdraw Your Consent?
CONSENT.CONTENT:
If you have given us consent to process your personal data for specific purposes, we will process your data within the scope of this consent, unless we have another legal justification.

You have the option to withdraw your consent at any time by sending an email to the address specified in the legal notice. Data processing that has already taken place is not affected by this.

RETENTION.TITLE: 3.4 How Long Do We Keep Your Data?
RETENTION.CONTENT:
We store personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the individual purposes for which the data was collected.

Data that we store during your visit to our website is kept for twelve months. An exception applies to analysis and tracking data, which may be retained longer.

SECURITY.TITLE: 3.5 How Do We Protect Your Data?
SECURITY.CONTENT:
We will keep your data secure and take all reasonable measures to protect your data from loss, access, misuse, or alterations.

Within our website, we use SSL (Secure Socket Layer) in conjunction with the highest level of encryption supported by your browser.

WEBSITE.TITLE: 4.1 Website Provision and Log Files
WEBSITE.SUBTITLE: What Information Do We Receive and How Do We Use It?
WEBSITE.CONTENT:
When visiting martin-jaros.ch, certain data is automatically stored on our servers for system administration, statistical, or security purposes. This includes:

• Your Internet service provider's name
• Your IP address (under certain circumstances)
• Your browser software version
• The operating system of the computer accessing the URL
• The date and time of access
• The website from which you visit the URL
• The search terms you used to find the URL

FIREBASE.TITLE: 4.2 Firebase
FIREBASE.CONTENT:
Our website and applications use Firebase, a developer platform provided by Google LLC (1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA; "Google"). Firebase offers a variety of tools and services for developing, managing, and improving web and mobile applications.

Through the use of Firebase, various data, including your IP address, information about your browser, date and time of access, and other interaction data, may be transmitted to and stored on Google servers.

Some of the specific Firebase services we use include:

• Firebase Realtime Database: A cloud-hosted NoSQL database service
• Firebase Analytics: An analytics tool for collecting data about app usage and user behavior
• Firebase Authentication: A service that provides authentication functions for our applications
• Firebase Cloud Messaging: A service for notifications and message delivery
